showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø The shower was very clean with lots of hot water and good water pressure. ‚Ä¶

Everyone was nice and friendly. The young man who was turning over the showers seem to be doing a really good job. He was one of the first I've seen that was spraying and like hard scrubbing / mopping the floor. The only concern is shower ‚Ä¶
Absolutely disgusting showers hope you don't get shower number 6.

Do not use washer 3 I wasted $2.75

Use washer 5 excellent üëå

Dryer 6 gets hot

Friendly staff

Shower 9 was clean ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Very handy if u are camping and need to stock up of fry a shower and grab some ice for the cooler or if say you are going fishing. ‚Ä¶
Nice place good coffee , shower very clean
I used a shower for a restroom only. But it gave me a chance to look around. And this is what I saw. By the way if your wondering my hair is red.
The rest of the place is average, except for typical cold shower problems from pilot/flyingJ. ‚Ä¶
Truck drivers beware. If you want to park here for the night the parking is tight and minimal. Also if you expect a hot shower I wouldn't stop here. The water was warm at best when I took a shower.

‚Ä¶ cleared from the pump so had to keep going. Very inconvenient. Could not get a shower either even though the kiosk took one off my rewards card. Did not give me a slip with code on it. Lady at the counter hand wrote one and that shower ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ worse and worse. I tried to reserve a shower app blocked me for no reason my co driver tried with his own phone same thing BLOCKED. lady at the counter RUDE a not trying to help anyone and asking 17$ for shower. I hope they teach ‚Ä¶

I stopped in last evening 02/26/24.    I fueled and showered.   The place was clean, all eight showers were available.    The shower was clean, fully functional, and had excellent water pressure.   The fuel pumps were all functional.   Ther ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly. The evening staff not so much. You can't even shower in the evening as according to the guy working he has no one to clean them even though there was another person working cleaning. How do you expect to stay in business as a ‚Ä¶

They desrve 0 star  Hudson,WI  the  worst customer communication service. I fuel park my Truck trying to get shower, get the shower ticket, the desk personal said showers are not useable due to not having staff to clean. ‚Ä¶

Came to shower in truck. Showers had nice hot water and great pressure. Towels are provided and small bar of soap. Didn't use towels as they aren't soft (brought my own). Was very clean however the double toilet paper dispenser was ‚Ä¶

Tried to shower on Saturday (10/21) night at 9pm  and was told there were no showers till 7 am because no one was going to clean them. They were nice enough to let me drop my trailer to go to the FlyingJ and take one. Then, on Sunday (10/22 ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ place, restaurant was closed already yesterday evening pretty early, just cold sandwiches.   This morning went to get my shower, and my number came up with no shower.  Waited way too long (about an hour) before I wandered down the hall ‚Ä¶
As an over the road trucker my spouse and I park at many truck stops; this TA was clean and the shower room was very clean and spacious. We will stop again.

We stayed here for our ten hour break while passing thru the area .We washed clothes ate supper at the restaurant there and took a shower there. Really friendly staff and the food was really good also ,clean showers, and clean laundry room ‚Ä¶

Shower was hot. Room was small for 2.  Parking lot small so we got reserve.  Grass area for dogs.  Nothing to eat but cold sandwiches,  major Fail. It's a place to shower & a bathroom though. The dog enjoyed it too. Lawsuit waiting to ‚Ä¶

Been driving cross country in the sex dungeon for 7 years, Loves is the truck stop of choice to grab a shower and coffee before I hit the hwy with scraps and review more Google favorites.  I love my job, Pilates and Paula üòçüòçüòç ‚Ä¶

First of all they have No Laundry
Went in to get shower, no towels. Good thing I caught it and went outside to ask for towels. They had no washcloths. Overall no bueno
Great truck stop. Nice employee's. The truck shop has very educated diesel repair tech's employed here. Plenty of shower's and it is a really clean parking lot.

We stopped for a quick shower between stops. Showers we're large & emaculate. They gave us extra towels with his and hers signs on them for us. Cute touch for a truck stop. Place was very clean for as busy as it was on a rainy day. Great ‚Ä¶

Worst place to be at .. especially the lady as their manager I guess . I have a picture of my Barcode for loves just to get a shower . Which I did a day before and today she gonna tell me they don‚Äôt allow that ?? Since when she was being ‚Ä¶

I wish they clean shower here. A driver just comes out of the shower and she hands me towels. When did love‚Äôs stop cleaning showers? I am definitely not gonna eat here. Who knows what else they don‚Äôt clean. With Covid going around, I ‚Ä¶
Very friendly staff. Clean hot shower. Clean organized store.  Hardee's has excellent customer service and fresh food. Ample truck parking. Great stop for everybody.

showerReviews.reviewText: First off, as a truck driver, it took 4 hours to get a shower! ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ much better. Staff standing around on their phones while drivers are waiting. Waited 3 hours for a shower and finally asked for a refund, as did 7 other drivers. Not only is the parking lot dirty, so is the inside. There was absolutely ‚Ä¶
rude staff, You have to wait more than an hour for a shower. ‚Ä¶

I can't complain about the food. But the shower issue needs to be addressed. Apparently you can purchase a shower on the app but these guys were letting people in first come first serve. I thought no one was cleaning the showers for a ‚Ä¶

To take a shower here, you have to wait 3 or 4 hours because there are two types of lines: one through the screen, by order, and another where the workers call people as they see fit‚Äîor those who pay them. So there end up being two separate ‚Ä¶

"Three staff members were standing there to assist only two customers, while we waited for someone to clean the shower rooms for almost 2 hours. no options food here.                                              "Here, you can see the dirty ‚Ä¶

Never come here. You wont get a shower. You wont get decent food. You wont get an answer if you call. This is the absolute worst pilot. -5 stars if possible. Ive been otr 3 years and have tried this place now a 3rd time, still horrible. Wou ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , half the pumps for big trucks are broken. The shower workers reek of weed and while you're showering you'll be serenade by raunchy shit music thumping to a level you can feel 8n the walls. Oh and in the video the shower doesn't shut off ‚Ä¶

I have been here since 1200, the shower line hasn‚Äôt moved by two people since I got here and logged in for a shower. 12 head now 10 in 4 hours?! I take at MOST 40 minutes to shower and shave. The math isn‚Äôt mathing.

For 20h only 15 showers past. This is disrespectful! First shift do something but second sift on April 20. And about the showers I was 3rd in line in 7this morning and now is 10 and I still didn‚Äôt got my shower. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I stopped for a 10 and shower. $8 for a shower. Water pressure was amazing. The 3 squares on the back are their own separate sprayers. 9/10. My only complaint is not having a fan in there for circulation. Shower 3 was clean. ‚Ä¶
This place is EXCELLENT!! Great customer service,  probably the best I've had in a long time. I took a shower there also & it was very clean.

‚Ä¶ . So was the Rum Raisin ice cream. I was offered a sample of all 8 flavors available at the time. Showers are $12. The shower I had, #4, was clean, has a bit of a view & has 3 streams in the shower that are controlled separately. It ‚Ä¶
Clean shower, and only 10 bucks! Friendly place and plenty of truck parking.  Great food!

This is a very clean truck stop. The toilets and showers are great. The showers are $8. You can experience a more luxurious shower than at major truck stops. The food at the restaurant next door was very delicious and the portions were more ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ do stop and have a look-see here. They have showers upstairs if you need a shower that have all the nozzles in the wall that is like a standing massage and it is Heavenly I'm telling you. The food is really really phenomenal and it's real ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ due to weather. We finally ordered breakfast and it was wonderful. Later that day we took showers, and OMG,best shower we have had on the road. After breakfast and showers we figured dinner was a good idea and it was!! I had a bacon ‚Ä¶
Best shower in the world. Seriously the best I've ever had. Had Polish Sausage and Sauerkraut special last night was very tasty and all I could eat. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the top of the Best truck stops across Great America. From the friendly personal at the fuel desk to the family style restaurant with great cooking...... and the showers are the BEST. Rather you just need fuel, eat or quick shower this is ‚Ä¶
Great diesel price for the state... 4/20/22 4.68/gal. Very trucker friendly also free shower plus beverage (50 gal min?) and 2 cent per gallon in store reward no card needed

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be
